1 Ready, Set, Learn!
Where we merge your existing knowledge with exciting new discoveries.
2 Inquiry-Based Learning!
Let’s Think! In this section, students will brainstorm and explore possible solutions to specific problems. This encourages critical thinking and creativity as they consider various approaches.
Explorer’s Toolkit Here, students will dive deeper into the topic. They will engage with curated videos, articles, educational games, and hands-on experiments to broaden their understanding and spark curiosity.
DIY Lab It’s part of the explore, students will undertake hands-on projects where they will design, build, and test their own creations. They will apply scientific principles, use technology and engineering skills, explore artistic concepts, and utilize mathematical reasoning.
Screen Lessons Students will watch videos that explain key concepts in an engaging and accessible way.
3 Problem-Based Learning:
• Introducing the problem: Students will join a journey to tackle real-world environmental challenges. Through hands-on activities and engaging tasks, they will apply their knowledge and skills to discover innovative solutions. • Apply the Engineering Design Process (EDP): Students will use a structured approach to define problems, conduct research, generate ideas, prototype solutions, test, evaluate, and refine their designs.
• The Scientific Method: Students will follow a systematic process of inquiry—making observations, forming hypotheses, conducting experiments, analyzing data, and drawing conclusions—to develop a deeper understanding of scientific concepts and problem-solving. In doing so, they will incorporate the CER framework to present their scientific claims, provide evidence from their experiments, and explain their reasoning behind the conclusions they draw.

4 Project-Based Learning:
PBL engages students in meaningful, long-lasting learning by immersing them in real-world challenges. Through hands-on projects, they develop critical thinking, creativity, collaboration, and communication skills. By investigating complex questions and designing innovative solutions, students take ownership of their learning, making it more impactful and transformative.
5 Story
Join Adam and Laila, two fearless STEAM Scouts, as they embark on exciting adventures filled with discovery, creativity, and problem-solving! Whether they're building inventions, tackling real-world challenges, or exploring new ideas, their journey will inspire you to think big, experiment, and innovate. Get ready to dive into a world of science, technology, engineering, arts, and math—where every challenge is a new adventure!
6 Assessment Exercises:
These are divided into three categories to ensure comprehensive learning and mastery.
Apprentice:
Developing understanding and can apply skills with guidance.
Builder: Demonstrates solid understanding and can apply skills independently.
Mastermind:
Demonstrates deep understanding and can apply skills creatively and strategically.
7 Career Readiness
This section equips students with essential skills for future careers by fostering problem-solving, teamwork, and adaptability. Through hands-on projects, real-world applications, and critical thinking challenges, students develop the confidence and competencies needed for success in the ever-evolving job market.
8 Mission Innovate
Now, it’s your turn! In Mission Innovate; students will apply their creativity, problem-solving skills, and knowledge to develop their own competition projects. This challenge encourages independent thinking, collaboration, and real-world innovation, empowering students to become the next generation of creators and problem-solvers. Now I Can
This section is designed to help you measure your progress and achievements. Enjoy your exploration and learning journey through this STEAM book!
My Journal In this part students will write their own story while they are creating the project.

MEET YOUR STEAM BOTS!
AIGo Bot
AIGo Bot is your helper for unlocking the world of Artificial Intelligence. It guides you through key AI concepts in the STEAM series, making complex ideas simple and exciting. With real-life examples, creative challenges, and curious questions, AIGo-Bot shows how AI is used in everything from smart devices to problem- solving robots.
Einstein Bot
Einstein Bot is your go-to for mastering math and science. Named after the famous physicist, it explains complex equations and scientific rules in an easy-to- understand way. Whether it›s algebra, physics, or chemistry, Einstein Bot is like having a mini-tutor at your fingertips.
Sparky Bot
Sparky Bot is your personal learning companion, supporting both your academic journey and emotional well-being. It helps you stay on track by making connections between lessons, offering friendly reminders.
Lab Bot
Lab Bot is your guide for hands-on experiments. It offers step-by-step instructions, safety tips, and troubleshooting advice for lab activities. Lab Bot ensures your experiments are smooth and successful, making science both fun and educational.

MEET THE CHARACTERS
Meet
Adam & Laila
the STEAM Scouts!
Adam is curious, inventive, and full of energy—always tinkering and exploring with a bold spirit.
Laila is creative, empathetic, and a natural leader who loves solving problems in clever ways. Together, they make the perfect team for STEAM adventures!
Meet Ms. Sara
The STEAM Scouts’ teacher! She loves helping Adam and Laila explore science, technology, engineering, art, and math. Ms. Sara is always full of creative ideas and helps them discover new ways to solve problems and make exciting inventions.
Meet Khaled
A smart and cheerful boy in a wheelchair! He’s always curious and loves exploring science, technology, engineering, art, and math with the STEAM Scouts. Khaled never lets anything stop him—his bright ideas and big heart help the team solve problems in clever ways.
